Title: Publish Thyroid Course on Gumroad
Labels: commerce,product

Summary:
Follow `GUMROAD_SETUP_GUIDE.md` to create the Thyroid Course product, upload files, set pricing, and add product links back into the site.

Checklist:
- [ ] Create Gumroad product "Thyroid Health Mastery Course" and set launch price
- [ ] Upload workbook PDFs and video links
- [ ] Add Gumroad product URLs to course pages and `QUICK_START.md`
